title: How TO - Rounded Images

metadata.description: Learn about How TO - Rounded Images with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content: Learn how to create rounded and circular images with CSS. How To Create Rounded Images Step 1) Add HTML: Example Step 2) Add CSS: Use the border-radius property to add rounded corners to an image. 50% will make the image circular: Example img { border-radius: 50%; } Go to our CSS Images Tutorial to learn more about how to style images. ★ +1
